mainText:
We   did not have Steve's intelligence or vision. We
did not borrow or have to learn
his intelligence. Steve took his genius and packaged it in a wonderful way that allowed us
to use his mind and creations...then share them with our family, friends, and total strangers. Steve made the world smaller with a voice near common.
His work changed humanity
forever. His Apple logo was the graphic of the temptation of the beginning... and until  now left a wonderful taste in our mouths.
author: Anonymous
